snippet.title: Haphazard Angel Trailer - New Art Style Trailer
snippet.description:
We're excited to show-off the newest trailer for Haphazard Angel with its awesome new art style! Our artists have done an incredible job bringing this fresh look to life.

At PGDX 2024, we showcased this revamped gameplay, and now you can see it too! Take control of the Angel Kaz with three friends and choose to ascend to the heavens or become a demon lord. Check out the trailer and don't forget to wishlist our game on Steam now!

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2363160/Haphazard_Angel/

Follow Us - https://allmylinks.com/capriccioso-studio
